sn34:1.1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṃ samādhikusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ samāpattikusalo.
sn34:1.1.5: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṃ samāpattikusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ samādhikusalo.
sn34:1.1.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī neva samādhismiṃ samādhikusalo hoti, na ca samādhismiṃ samāpattikusalo.
sn34:1.1.7: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṃ samādhikusalo ca hoti, samādhismiṃ samāpattikusalo ca.
sn34:1.1.8: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvāyaṃ jhāyī samādhismiṃ samādhikusalo ca hoti samādhismiṃ samāpattikusalo ca ayaṃ imesaṃ catunnaṃ jhāyīnaṃ aggo ca seṭṭho ca mokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro ca.
sn34:1.1.9: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, gavā khīraṃ, khīramhā dadhi, dadhimhā navanītaṃ, navanītamhā sappi, sappimhā sappimaṇḍo tatra aggamakkhāyati;
sn34:1.1.10: evameva kho, bhikkhave, yvāyaṃ jhāyī samādhismiṃ samādhikusalo ca hoti samādhismiṃ samāpattikusalo ca ayaṃ imesaṃ catunnaṃ jhāyīnaṃ aggo ca seṭṭho ca mokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro cā”ti.
sn34:2.1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṃ samādhikusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ ṭhitikusalo.
sn34:2.1.5: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṃ ṭhitikusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ samādhikusalo.
sn34:2.1.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī neva samādhismiṃ samādhikusalo hoti, na ca samādhismiṃ ṭhitikusalo.
sn34:2.1.7: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṃ samādhikusalo ca hoti, samādhismiṃ ṭhitikusalo ca.
sn34:2.1.8: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvāyaṃ jhāyī samādhismiṃ samādhikusalo ca hoti samādhismiṃ ṭhitikusalo ca ayaṃ imesaṃ catunnaṃ jhāyīnaṃ aggo ca seṭṭho ca mokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro ca.
sn34:2.1.9: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, gavā khīraṃ, khīramhā dadhi, dadhimhā navanītaṃ, navanītamhā sappi, sappimhā sappimaṇḍo tatra aggamakkhāyati;
sn34:2.1.10: evameva kho, bhikkhave, yvāyaṃ jhāyī samādhismiṃ samādhikusalo ca hoti samādhismiṃ ṭhitikusalo ca ayaṃ imesaṃ catunnaṃ jhāyīnaṃ aggo ca seṭṭho ca mokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro cā”ti.
sn34:3.1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṃ samādhikusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ vuṭṭhānakusalo.
sn34:3.1.5: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṃ vuṭṭhānakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ samādhikusalo.
sn34:3.1.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī neva samādhismiṃ samādhikusalo hoti, na ca samādhismiṃ vuṭṭhānakusalo.
sn34:3.1.7: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṃ samādhikusalo ca hoti, samādhismiṃ vuṭṭhānakusalo ca.
sn34:3.1.8: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvāyaṃ jhāyī samādhismiṃ samādhikusalo ca hoti samādhismiṃ vuṭṭhānakusalo ca ayaṃ imesaṃ catunnaṃ jhāyīnaṃ aggo ca seṭṭho ca mokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro ca.
sn34:4.1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṃ samādhikusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ kallitakusalo.
sn34:4.1.5: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṃ kallitakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ samādhikusalo.
sn34:4.1.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī neva samādhismiṃ samādhikusalo hoti, na ca samādhismiṃ kallitakusalo.
sn34:4.1.7: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṃ samādhikusalo ca hoti, samādhismiṃ kallitakusalo ca.
sn34:4.1.8: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvāyaṃ jhāyī samādhismiṃ samādhikusalo ca hoti samādhismiṃ kallitakusalo ca ayaṃ imesaṃ catunnaṃ jhāyīnaṃ aggo ca seṭṭho ca mokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro ca.
sn34:5.1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṃ samādhikusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ ārammaṇakusalo.
sn34:5.1.5: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṃ ārammaṇakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ samādhikusalo.
sn34:5.1.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī neva samādhismiṃ samādhikusalo hoti, na ca samādhismiṃ ārammaṇakusalo.
sn34:5.1.7: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṃ samādhikusalo ca hoti, samādhismiṃ ārammaṇakusalo ca.
sn34:5.1.8: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvāyaṃ jhāyī samādhismiṃ samādhikusalo ca hoti samādhismiṃ ārammaṇakusalo ca ayaṃ imesaṃ catunnaṃ jhāyīnaṃ aggo ca seṭṭho ca mokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro ca.
sn34:6.1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṃ samādhikusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ gocarakusalo.
sn34:6.1.5: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṃ gocarakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ samādhikusalo.
sn34:6.1.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī neva samādhismiṃ samādhikusalo hoti, na ca samādhismiṃ gocarakusalo.
sn34:6.1.7: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṃ samādhikusalo ca hoti, samādhismiṃ gocarakusalo ca.
sn34:6.1.8: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvāyaṃ jhāyī samādhismiṃ samādhikusalo ca hoti samādhismiṃ gocarakusalo ca ayaṃ imesaṃ catunnaṃ jhāyīnaṃ aggo ca seṭṭho ca mokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro ca.
sn34:7.1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṃ samādhikusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ abhinīhārakusalo.
sn34:7.1.5: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṃ abhinīhārakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ samādhikusalo.
sn34:7.1.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī neva samādhismiṃ samādhikusalo hoti, na ca samādhismiṃ abhinīhārakusalo.
sn34:7.1.7: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṃ samādhikusalo ca hoti, samādhismiṃ abhinīhārakusalo ca.
sn34:7.1.8: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvāyaṃ jhāyī samādhismiṃ samādhikusalo ca hoti samādhismiṃ abhinīhārakusalo ca ayaṃ imesaṃ catunnaṃ jhāyīnaṃ aggo ca seṭṭho ca mokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro ca.
sn34:8.1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṃ samādhikusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ sakkaccakārī.
sn34:8.1.5: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṃ sakkaccakārī hoti, na samādhismiṃ samādhikusalo.
sn34:8.1.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī neva samādhismiṃ samādhikusalo hoti, na ca samādhismiṃ sakkaccakārī.
sn34:8.1.7: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṃ samādhikusalo ca hoti, samādhismiṃ sakkaccakārī ca.

sn34:20-27.1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṃ ṭhitikusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ vuṭṭhānakusalo.
sn34:20-27.1.5: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṃ vuṭṭhānakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ ṭhitikusalo.
sn34:20-27.1.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī neva samādhismiṃ ṭhitikusalo hoti, na ca samādhismiṃ vuṭṭhānakusalo.
sn34:20-27.1.7: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṃ ṭhitikusalo ca hoti, samādhismiṃ vuṭṭhānakusalo ca.
sn34:20-27.1.11: (Purimamūlakāni viya yāva sattavīsatimā ṭhitimūlakasappāyakārīsuttā aṭṭha suttāni pūretabbāni. Ṭhitimūlakaṃ.)
sn34:28-34.1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṃ vuṭṭhānakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ kallitakusalo …
sn34:28-34.1.5: samādhismiṃ kallitakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ vuṭṭhānakusalo …
sn34:28-34.1.6: neva samādhismiṃ vuṭṭhānakusalo hoti, na ca samādhismiṃ kallitakusalo …
sn34:28-34.1.7: samādhismiṃ vuṭṭhānakusalo ca hoti samādhismiṃ kallitakusalo ca.
sn34:28-34.1.11: (Purimamūlakāni viya yāva catuttiṃsatimā vuṭṭhānamūlakasappāyakārīsuttā satta suttāni pūretabbāni. Vuṭṭhānamūlakaṃ.)
sn34:35-40.1.3: samādhismiṃ ārammaṇakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ kallitakusalo …
sn34:35-40.1.4: neva samādhismiṃ kallitakusalo hoti, na ca samādhismiṃ ārammaṇakusalo …
sn34:35-40.1.5: samādhismiṃ kallitakusalo ca hoti, samādhismiṃ ārammaṇakusalo ca.
sn34:35-40.1.9: (Purimamūlakāni viya yāva cattālīsamā kallitamūlakasappāyakārīsuttā cha suttāni pūretabbāni. Kallitamūlakaṃ.)
sn34:41-45.1.3: samādhismiṃ gocarakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ ārammaṇakusalo …
sn34:41-45.1.4: neva samādhismiṃ ārammaṇakusalo hoti, na ca samādhismiṃ gocarakusalo …
sn34:41-45.1.5: samādhismiṃ ārammaṇakusalo ca hoti, samādhismiṃ gocarakusalo ca.
sn34:41-45.1.9: (Purimamūlakāni viya yāva pañcacattālīsamā ārammaṇamūlakasappāyakārīsuttā pañca suttāni pūretabbāni.)
sn34:46-49.1.3: samādhismiṃ abhinīhārakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ gocarakusalo …
sn34:46-49.1.4: neva samādhismiṃ gocarakusalo hoti, na ca samādhismiṃ abhinīhārakusalo …
sn34:46-49.1.5: samādhismiṃ gocarakusalo ca hoti, samādhismiṃ abhinīhārakusalo ca …
sn34:46-49.1.6: seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, gavā khīraṃ, khīramhā dadhi, dadhimhā navanītaṃ, navanītamhā sappi, sappimhā sappimaṇḍo tatra aggamakkhāyati;
sn34:46-49.1.7: evameva kho, bhikkhave, yvāyaṃ jhāyī samādhismiṃ gocarakusalo ca hoti samādhismiṃ abhinīhārakusalo ca ayaṃ imesaṃ catunnaṃ jhāyīnaṃ …pe…
sn34:46-49.2.1: Chacattālīsamaṃ. “Samādhismiṃ gocarakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ sakkaccakārī …pe….
sn34:46-49.3.1: Sattacattālīsamaṃ. “Samādhismiṃ gocarakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ sātaccakārī …pe….
sn34:46-49.4.1: Aṭṭhacattālīsamaṃ. “Samādhismiṃ gocarakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ sappāyakārī …pe….
sn34:50-52.1.3: samādhismiṃ sakkaccakārī hoti, na samādhismiṃ abhinīhārakusalo …
sn34:50-52.1.4: neva samādhismiṃ abhinīhārakusalo hoti, na ca samādhismiṃ sakkaccakārī …
sn34:50-52.1.5: samādhismiṃ abhinīhārakusalo ca hoti, samādhismiṃ sakkaccakārī ca.
sn34:50-52.2.1: Paññāsamaṃ. “Samādhismiṃ abhinīhārakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ sātaccakārī …pe….
sn34:50-52.3.1: Ekapaññāsamaṃ. “Samādhismiṃ abhinīhārakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ sappāyakārī …pe….
sn34:53-54.1.3: samādhismiṃ sātaccakārī hoti, na samādhismiṃ sakkaccakārī …
sn34:53-54.1.4: neva samādhismiṃ sakkaccakārī hoti, na ca samādhismiṃ sātaccakārī …
sn34:53-54.1.5: samādhismiṃ sakkaccakārī ca hoti, samādhismiṃ sātaccakārī ca.
sn34:53-54.2.1: Tepaññāsamaṃ. “Samādhismiṃ sakkaccakārī hoti, na samādhismiṃ sappāyakārī …pe….
sn34:55.1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṃ sātaccakārī hoti, na samādhismiṃ sappāyakārī.
sn34:55.1.5: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṃ sappāyakārī hoti, na samādhismiṃ sātaccakārī.
sn34:55.1.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī neva samādhismiṃ sātaccakārī hoti, na ca samādhismiṃ sappāyakārī.
sn34:55.1.7: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṃ sātaccakārī ca hoti, samādhismiṃ sappāyakārī ca.
sn34:55.1.8: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvāyaṃ jhāyī samādhismiṃ sātaccakārī ca hoti samādhismiṃ sappāyakārī ca ayaṃ imesaṃ catunnaṃ jhāyīnaṃ aggo ca seṭṭho ca mokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro ca.
sn34:55.1.9: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, gavā khīraṃ, khīramhā dadhi, dadhimhā navanītaṃ, navanītamhā sappi, sappimhā sappimaṇḍo tatra aggamakkhāyati;
sn34:55.1.10: evameva kho, bhikkhave, yvāyaṃ jhāyī samādhismiṃ sātaccakārī ca hoti, samādhismiṃ sappāyakārī ca ayaṃ imesaṃ catunnaṃ jhāyīnaṃ aggo ca seṭṭho ca mokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro cā”ti.
sn34:55.1.12: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti.
